attributes.action: revert to the original meaning of the NHS - 'care from the cradle to the grave by means of an insurance based contribution'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would allow people who have worked all their lives and contributed to the system to live out their retirement years abroad knowing that if they became ill they could come back 'home'/UK for treatment.  The present practise is to exlude them, yet we allow foreigners and those who have not contributed to the system FREE treatment.  Recent Tonight with Trevor MacDonald programmes have highlighted concerns by ex-pats who have paid all their lives and now find themselves having to sell their homes to fund treatment back in the UK.  Their money is funding foreigners and those who have never contributed at all.
